message:
Hey there! I'm ACE, your friendly academic AI assistant. It looks like you might be a little excited – is everything okay? 😊

I can help you with a whole bunch of things related to your studies, from understanding tricky concepts to creating flashcards or even quizzes. Basically, if you’re struggling with something academically, I’m here to lend a hand.

To start, could you tell me a little about yourself? What's your name, what are you studying, and what kind of help are you looking for today? Don’t worry about being too formal, just a little chat will do!
Okay, no worries! It sounds like you're done for now. 😊 If you change your mind and need anything at all, just let me know. Have a great day!
